readingMnemonic: The only creature powerful enough to withstand the force of these white water <kanji>spring</kanji>s is the mythical <reading>cen</reading>taur (せん). His horse body allows him to be stable and withstand the white water shooting up from the spring. Centaurs are pretty impressive creatures.
meaningMnemonic: <radical>White</radical> <radical>water</radical> shoots out from a <kanji>spring</kanji> in the ground. Due to the force the water shoots from the spring, the water looks white with all the air bubbles.
